::Nightlight::

She was to weak to understand what was going on there, she had been 
sleeping to much time, and wake up and defend herself wouldn't be 
easy. Sudden something  fell in her lap and roll towards her head. 
She could heard a scream and it made her react, trying to open her 
bright cyan eyes while she slowly moved again trying to open the pod 
door but few plants still were bloked it while a scarse light fell 
inside pod...


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Trinity::
> 
> She growled and kicked the plants off her. "I just want to see the 
> bot inside. I want to see what it looks like and see if he wants to 
> play."
> 
> She saw a big clump of weeds still on the top of the pod. She 
climbed 
> up and grabbed onto it. She tried to move it.  Then she heard 
> something start to crack. She looked at the glass she was standing 
on 
> as saw that it looked like a sider web. "Uh oh." She turned to run 
> but fell through the glass and landed inside the pod. She rolled 
down 
> to the other end, where the head of the bot would be. She screamed 
as 
> she saw the outline of a head in the faint light inside the 
> pod. "AHHHHHHHHHHH!"
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Windlord::
> > 
> > Windlord couldn't hold an smile and tried again to stand up.
> > 
> > "Are you impatient to meet at the bot... Kittybot?" he asked
> >
